name: Logic for philosophy
tagline: These are answers to the exercises in Ted Sider's Logic for Philosophy.
body:
### Welcome to this GitHub page.
Working through Ted Sider's _Logic for Philosophy_ with some other people here at UCL, I decided that it would be nice to experiment using GitHub to compile a document with the answers to the exercises in the book. 

At this stage, it is possible to comment on the TeX file and suggest changes. I am not sure if anyone is interested in experimenting with more Git's functionality. 

For those that just wish to download the most recent version of the PDF file, they can find it [here](https://github.com/msteenhagen/logic-philosophy/blob/master/siderexercises.pdf?raw=true).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
